LanguageData.AnimalNaturalHeartTiny.label: animal heart (tiny)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalHeartTiny.description:
Supplies blood and oxygen to all parts of the body. Ready to find a new owner.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of less than 0.3.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalKidneyTiny.label: animal kidney (tiny)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalKidneyTiny.description:
Filters and removes waste products from the blood.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of less than 0.3.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLiverTiny.label: animal liver (tiny)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLiverTiny.description:
Plays an important role in metabolism.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of less than 0.3.
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLungTiny.label: animal lung (tiny)
LanguageData.AnimalNaturalLungTiny.description:
Essential part of the respiratory system.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of less than 0.3.
LanguageData.AnimalPainstopperTiny.label: animal painstopper (tiny)
LanguageData.AnimalPainstopperTiny.description:
This brain implant will make an animal not feel pain.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of less than 0.3.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalArmTiny.label: bionic animal arm (tiny)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalArmTiny.description:
One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of less than 0.3.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEarTiny.label: bionic animal ear (tiny)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEarTiny.description:
An advanced artificial ear implant. A collection of invisible subdermal microphones capture sound and transmit it to a biogel nerve interface that links directly with the auditory nerve. It's sensitive enough to hear a cat before you see it, can't be damaged by loud noise, and automatically tunes itself to pick out meaningful sounds in noisy environments.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of less than 0.3.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEyeTiny.label: bionic animal eye (tiny)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalEyeTiny.description:
Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace a natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of less than 0.3.
LanguageData.BionicAnimalLegTiny.label: bionic animal leg (tiny)
LanguageData.BionicAnimalLegTiny.description:
Bionic leg uses cutting-edge technology to give its owner extreme walking comfort and strength.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of less than 0.3.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalArmTiny.label: prosthetic animal arm (tiny)
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalArmTiny.descriptio:
Simple but durable arm prosthesis.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of less than 0.3.
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalLegTiny.label: prosthetic animal leg (tiny)
LanguageData.SimpleProstheticAnimalLegTiny.descriptio:
Simple prosthesis made to replace a missing leg. Not very comfortable but quite efficient.
Fits on animals with a mature body size of less than 0.3.
